author: quintonm
msg: Backport of scheduler service from Fulcrum + enhancements
- TurbineException is thrown instead of Exception
- Scheduler can be enabled/disabled after Turbine is initialized
- fixed bug preventing change of a jobEntry from being recognized by the scheduler.
- Added a new pull tool for accessing the scheduler service from a Velocity template
